message.content: In this question, we need to use logic and knowledge about the habitat and behavior of birds. When the apple tree is chopped down, the birds lose their place to build nests. Option (C) is incorrect because falling leaves can occur regardless of the presence of the tree. Only option (D) directly relates to the habitat provided by the apple tree for bird nests.

Therefore, the correct answer is (D) bird's nests. Options (A), (B), and (C) may have been associated with the apple tree, but they are not directly dependent on the presence of the tree itself. Only option (D) is directly affected by the tree being chopped down.
